Brand.BrandedKeys: <BrandedKey source="Company" branded="<%= organization %>" /> <BrandedKey source="CompanyLogo" branded="Image.<%= appName %>.<%= defaultModule %>.CompanyLogo.png" /> <BrandedKey source="MenuManagerSplash" branded="Image.<%= appName %>.<%= defaultModule %>.SplashMenuManager.jpg" /> <BrandedKey source="ProductTitle" branded="<%= appDescription %>" />
